note.p: Nurseryman. Solicitor's clerk in Stamford, 1851. Lawyer in Stamford, 1861, 1871. Seedsman in Bedford, 1881, 1891. Raised new varieties of peas, beans, and strawberries. Conducted breeding experiments on Pisum for CD.

Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/2094/192/22), 1861 (RG9/2311/49/7), 1871 (RG10/3309/135/23), 1881 (RG11/1619/97/23), 1891 (RG12/1249/142/26)
Northamptonshire, England, Church of England baptisms, 1813–1912 (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 August 2019)
